HouseofLords Session 2001- 02Judgments-Reginav.LondonBoroughofHammersmithandFulhamandOthers,ExPBurkettandAnotherHOUSEOFLORDS
Lord Slynn of Hadley Lord Steyn Lord Hope of Craighead Lord Millett Lord Phillips of Worth MatraversOPINIONSOFTHELORDSOFAPPEALFORJUDGMENTINTHECAUSE REGINA v. LONDON BOROUGH OF HAMMERSMITH AND FULHAM (RESPONDENTS) AND OTHERS EX PARTE BURKETT AND ANOTHER (FC) (APPELLANTS)ON 23 MAY 2002 [2002] UKHL 23

P.SENT: The respondent is the London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham ("the local authority").
St George West London Ltd is the developer and is joined in the proceedings as an interested party ("the developer").
